Setup logging

initialize_logging.Rd

Setup logging

Usage

initialize_logging(
  max_bytes = 1000000L,
  max_files = 7L,
  create_directory = TRUE
)

Arguments

max_bytes

the max_bytes parameter passed to logger::appender_file

max_files

the max_files parameter passed to logger::appender_file

create_directory

a boolean, TRUE to create the directory
